title: Nemi
content:
I wonder if anyone has ever heard of Nemi? It's a Norwegian comic strip. I think it's translated on some Finnish newspaper as well or something, but not sure. Anyways, I've been reading their translations online. It's quite fun. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] She's a bit crazy sometimes.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Here's the Wikipedia entry:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nemi_(comic_strip)]en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nemi_(comic_strip)[/url]

Here's a few translated ones as examples. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

[img]http://fcuk.fc.funpic.de/nemis/nemi_may18.gif[/img]

[img]http://fcuk.fc.funpic.de/nemis/nemi_apr5.jpg[/img]

[img]http://fcuk.fc.funpic.de/nemis/nemi_060112.jpg[/img]3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

content:
I don't know it, but it sure is fun! Gonna check out the other comics sometime later. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
I have a boring signature.

...
Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site[/url].
